hymn.title: Lord, Thou hast won, at length I yield

layout.singingstanza: Lord, Thou hast won, at length I yield; My heart by might -- y grace com -- pelled Sur -- ren -- ders all to Thee; A -- gainst Thy ter -- rors long I strove, But who can stand a -- gainst Thy love? Love con -- quers ev -- en me.

lyrics.stanza: If Thou hadst bid Thy thunders roll, And light'nings flash, to blast my soul, I still had stubborn been; But mercy has my heart subdued, A bleeding Savior I have viewed, And now I hate my sin.
Now, Lord, I would be Thine alone, Come, take possession of Thine own, For Thou hast set me free; Released from Satan's hard command, See all my powers waiting stand, To be employed by Thee.
